input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Example: BMC_ARS_System, HP_ServiceCenter, BMC_Remedyforce, ServiceNow

An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The task concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.

An XML document in the following form:
<Configuration-Items> <Configuration-Item> <name>ATL-cisco1720-04</name> <reconciliation-id>OI-811E85534C0041D18C7D723FE933E838</reconciliation-id> </Configuration-Item> <Configuration-Item> <name>Persius1</name> <reconciliation-id>OI-811E85534C0041D18C7D723FE933E8AE</reconciliation-id> </Configuration-Item> <Configuration-Item> <name>ATL-cisco1720-04</name> <reconciliation-id>AG005056B51824Z4EZSQElKeAwo3sB</reconciliation-id> </Configuration-Item> </Configuration-Items>

output.description: An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The task concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.
An XML document containing failed tasks.
String Value - Count of successful tasks.
String Value - Count of tasks that failed.

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: success, failure.
String Value - A process specific explanation for the value of success status.

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <soap-message /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("This Configuration Item is associated with: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org" xmlns:urn="TMS_TaskInterface" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" cdata-section-elements="Envelope RelationshipUpdate " /> <xsl:template match="/"> <soapenv:Envelope> <soapenv:Header> <urn:AuthenticationInfo> <urn:userName>$[web services user name]</urn:userName> <urn:password>$[web services password]</urn:password> </urn:AuthenticationInfo> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:UpdateTaskAndRelationships> <tem:TaskUpdate> <tem:TaskID>$[task id]</tem:TaskID> </tem:TaskUpdate> <tem:RelationshipUpdate> <tem:RelationshipU> <tem:RelationshipsID /> <tem:RelationshipsInstanceID /> <tem:RelationshipsStatus> <xsl:text>1</xsl:text> </tem:RelationshipsStatus> <tem:RelatedItemID>${reconciliation id}</tem:RelatedItemID> <tem:RelatedItemSource>${related item source}</tem:RelatedItemSource> <tem:RelatedItemType>${related item type}</tem:RelatedItemType> <tem:Description>${ci name}</tem:Description> <tem:Attribute1 /> <tem:Attribute2>${attribute 2}</tem:Attribute2> <tem:Attribute3 /> <tem:RelationshipType>${relationship type}</tem:RelationshipType> <tem:FormName02>${form name 02}</tem:FormName02> <tem:TaskID>$[task id]</tem:TaskID> <tem:TaskInstanceID>$[task instance id]</tem:TaskInstanceID> <tem:LookupKeyword>${lookup keyword}</tem:LookupKeyword> <tem:Submitter>$[web services user name]</tem:Submitter> <tem:ShortDesc>${short description}</tem:ShortDesc> <tem:SessionStatus> <xsl:text>Previously Created</xsl:text> </tem:SessionStatus> <tem:z1DAction> <xsl:text>CREATEPARENTASSOC</xsl:text> </tem:z1DAction> </tem:RelationshipU> </tem:RelationshipUpdate> </urn:UpdateTaskAndRelationships> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:value-of select="reconciliation-id/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </tem:RelatedItemID> <tem:RelatedItemSource>${related item source}</tem:RelatedItemSource> <tem:RelatedItemType>${related item type}</tem:RelatedItemType> <tem:Description> <xsl:value-of select="name/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </tem:Description> <tem:Attribute1 /> <tem:Attribute2>${attribute 2}</tem:Attribute2> <tem:Attribute3 /> <tem:RelationshipType>${relationship type}</tem:RelationshipType> <tem:FormName02>${form name 02}</tem:FormName02> <tem:TaskID>$[task id]</tem:TaskID> <tem:TaskInstanceID>$[task instance id]</tem:TaskInstanceID> <tem:LookupKeyword>${lookup keyword}</tem:LookupKeyword> <tem:Submitter>$[web services user name]</tem:Submitter> <tem:ShortDesc>${short description}</tem:ShortDesc> <tem:SessionStatus> <xsl:text>Previously Created</xsl:text> </tem:SessionStatus> <tem:z1DAction> <xsl:text>CREATEPARENTASSOC</xsl:text> </tem:z1DAction> </tem:RelationshipU> </tem:RelationshipUpdate> </xsl:for-each> </urn:UpdateTaskAndRelationships> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

select="//field[@name="actual-price"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </actual-price> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="SLABreached"]/text() != '0'"> <SLABreached> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="SLABreached"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </SLABreached> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="c-i-down"]/text() != '0'"> <c-i-down> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="c-i-down"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </c-i-down> </xsl:if> </middle> <close> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Structure</xsl:text> </type> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="completion-code"]/text() != '0'"> <completion-code> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="completion-code"]/text()" /> </value> </completion-code> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Decimal</xsl:text> </type> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="closing-comments"]/text() != '0'"> <closing-comments> <type> <xsl:text>Array</xsl:text> </type> <closing-comments> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="closing-comments-line1"]/text() != '0'"> <element> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="closing-comments-line1"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="closing-comments-line2"]/text() != '0'"> <element> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="closing-comments-line2"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </element> </xsl:if> </closing-comments> </closing-comments> </xsl:if> </close> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="urgency"]/text() != '0'"> <urgency> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="urgency"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </urgency> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="//field[@name="initial-assessment"]/text() != '0'"> <initial-assessment> <value> <xsl:copy-of select="//field[@name="initial-assessment"]/text()" /> </value> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">String</xsl:text> </type> </initial-assessment> </xsl:if> </instance> </model> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="//item/metadata/status" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("The update was unsuccessful for Task ID: ", .)
concat("The update of Task data was completed successfully for ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:copy-of select="//Tasks/*" /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <task-instance-link-name> <xsl:copy-of select="concat(concat(//task-id, "_"), //instance-name)" /> </task-instance-link-name> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Task> <xsl:copy-of select="//task-id" /> <xsl:copy-of select="//instance-name" /> <object-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Task__c</xsl:text> </object-name> <object-record-id> <xsl:copy-of select="//task-id/text()" /> </object-record-id> <task-instance-link-name>${task ci link name}</task-instance-link-name> </Task> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Unable to create change because of the following: ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <objects> <object> <xsl:for-each select="//object"> <type>${schema name}</type> <xsl:copy-of select="./*" /> </xsl:for-each> </object> </objects> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:xalan="http://xml.apache.org/xalan" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="tasksVar">${task}</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <xsl:apply-templates select="//Configuration-Item" /> </items> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="Configuration-Item"> <xsl:apply-templates select="xalan:nodeset($tasksVar)//Task"> <xsl:with-param name="ci-name" select="name/text()" /> </xsl:apply-templates> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="Task"> <xsl:param name="ci-name" /> <item> <xsl:element name="${field name}"> <xsl:value-of select="$ci-name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:element> <task> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </task> <importset-table> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${import set table name}</xsl:text> </importset-table> </item> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <create-relationship-responses> <error-messages> <xsl:apply-templates select="//message" /> </error-messages> <relationship-ids> <xsl:apply-templates select="//sys-id" /> </relationship-ids> </create-relationship-responses> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="sys-id"> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="message"> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:xalan="http://xml.apache.org/xalan" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:variable name="rootNode" select="name(/*)" /> <xsl:variable name="childNode" select="name(/*/*)" /> <xsl:variable name="itemsVar">${items}</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:element name="{$rootNode}"> <xsl:copy-of select="/*/*" /> <xsl:copy-of select="xalan:nodeset($itemsVar)//Task" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <error-message> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(//message) and string-length(normalize-space(//message/text())) > 0"> <xsl:value-of select="//message/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </error-message> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> ${task} </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="number(.) > 0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">failure</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">success</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:xalan="http://xml.apache.org/xalan" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:variable name="newTaskVar">${task}</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:copy-of select="./node()/*" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="name(xalan:nodeset($newTaskVar)/*) = 'Tasks'"> <xsl:copy-of select="xalan:nodeset($newTaskVar)/*/*" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This workflow will create a realtionship between a given task and a given configuration item.
